general.gigTitle: do design redesign wordpress business website and wordpress website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Landing Page that Attracts Your Target Audience!
sellerCard.description: Hi there! I'm Abir, a dedicated web developer with a flair for creating stunning WordPress websites, seamless Shopify stores, and impactful landing pages. My mission is to deliver top-notch web solutions that not only look great but also drive results. With a keen eye for design and a deep understanding of functionality, I ensure your online presence stands out and thrives. Let's collaborate to turn your digital dreams into reality. Contact me today, and let's embark on a journey to elevate your brand together!

description.content:
Are you looking for a professional WordPress Developer who can create a unique, functional, and visually appealing WordPress website design with your brand identity?


Look no further!

I specialize with 5+ years of practical experience in WordPress website development. I can design and develop a custom website from scratch or redesign websites from an existing site that will be fully functional and integrate your preferred colors, fonts, and graphics.


Whether you need a business website, WordPress blog, ecommerce site, or any other WordPress site, I've got you covered.


What I Offer:


  • Fully Responsive Design
  • eCommerce Functionality
  • SEO Friendly & Speed Optimization
  • Completed Functional Development
  • Attractive Layout with Color Combination
  • Setup Any Payment Gateway
  • Redesign Existing site for Better Looks
  • Multilingual Store + Multi-Currency
  • Live Chat & Bug Fixing
  • Live Chat & Bug Fixing + Subscription Popup
  • Social Media Integration
  • Site Transfer to Another Domain or Hosting


Why Choose Me?


  1. Highly Professional and Top-Notch Service
  2. SEO-Ready, Optimized
  3. You will Get 100% Up to Your Satisfaction
  4. Fluent and Friendly Communication


Are you ready now? Let's proceed to the next stage.

slide.name: do design redesign wordpress business website and wordpress website development

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do we need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We need 1- One or more reference websites that you like (this will give us an idea of your expectations). 2- Logins to your WordPress (if already set up). 3- Please let us know which sections you need on the landing page. 4- We would need the images and text for the landing page.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you convert the Psd/Figma/Xd/Ai to Elementor Website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we can convert the PSD/Xd/Figma/Ai to Responsive Elementor Website design. We'd need the PSD/Xd/Figma/Ai. Please contact us before placing an order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need to purchase the elementor pro?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: NO, You don't need to buy or worry about this. We have, we'll install and activate it. Free for one Year :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you design the landing page for my product?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we can design the landing page for your product with online order functionality + Payment integration PayPal, Stripe etc.. Please contact us first.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't have the content. Can you start without content?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Sure, We would love to start. We will use dummy text and images and you will be able to change or replace the content in the future. We'll give you the proper video guidelines on how to change or replace the content (if need).

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't know how to manage the website. Can you help me
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, Don't worry about it. You will get priority and future free support. As we said, we'll make a video and guide you on how to edit the text images, and manage the website in the future :) Please contact us via inbox.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Confused, which package should I select?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No worries, Please first send us the content (text and images) or structure of the landing page, so we'll let you know the best price and time according to the sections and page length :)

packageList.title: SINGLE WEB PAGE (LANDING PAGE)
packageList.description: Landing Page Design + WordPress & Payment Integration + Responsive

packageList.title: BUSINESS WEBSITE
packageList.description: Design Up to 7 Pages + Complete Ecommerce or WooCommerce Website + Responsive

packageList.title: PREMIUM WEBSITE (RECOMMENDED)
packageList.description: Design Up to 10 Pages + Complete WooCommerce + Functionalities + Responsive + SEO

reviews.comment: My honest review: Most importantly he was honest in the transaction. A lot of guys just try to rush you through but Abir gave me the time. He worked to understand what I needed done and completed the work. If there were any adjustments needed he made them and is also happy to continue with adjustments after the gig is done if any touch ups are needed. Very good experience.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your heartfelt review! I'm truly touched by your kind words about my approach to our collaboration. You're absolutely right - taking the time to understand what clients need and being available for adjustments is crucial to me. I'm committed to maintaining this level of service and support, even after project completion. Your satisfaction means everything to me, and I'm grateful for the opportunity to work with you!

reviews.comment: I am just starting my business and he supplied everything I needed to get my website up and running. Highly Recommended.

seller_response.comment: I enjoyed working on this project. All expectations and requirements were communicated upfront and the client was responsive to any of my requests for clarification. I liked working with him and hope to have the opportunity to work with him again.

reviews.comment: I’m so happy with how the website turned out! It looks great, works perfectly, and really fits my brand. The team was awesome to work with—friendly, professional, and quick

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. It's a pleasure to work with you.

reviews.comment: Excellent work on my WordPress site! he delivered a fully functional and visually appealing website that met all my requirements. The site is fast, responsive, and has everything I need to attract more customers. His professionalism and expertise made this process seamless!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback! I'm glad you’re happy with the website and my support. It was a pleasure working on your project, and I’m always here to help whenever needed. Your kind words mean a lot, and I appreciate your trust in my work. Looking forward to future collaborations!

reviews.comment: He asked for an extension without have starting the project yet. Had to call a project manager who spoke better English than him to understand the concept. Asked multiple times for login information among other small details. He lacks understanding of a blank slate and further more cannot speak English as advertised.

seller_response.comment:
I’m truly surprised to see this feedback, as our communication and understanding throughout the project were always smooth and professional. I had multiple meetings with you to clarify every detail, and as per our discussions, I successfully delivered the project to your satisfaction.

From our past conversations, it was clear that you were happy with my work. 

https://prnt.sc/1NEHSqVKKRmV

Even after delivery, we communicated positively in the inbox: 

https://prnt.sc/Y6C-6qEiy5hm

I strongly believe there has been some misunderstanding, or perhaps this feedback was mistakenly submitted. If there’s any concern, I’m always available to discuss and resolve it. Your satisfaction is my priority, and I’d truly appreciate it if you could review this matter again.
